publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1209 Jeremy Purvis: Happy Birthday Radio Borders—That the Parliament congratulates Radio Borders on reaching maturity with the celebrations this week of its 18th birthday; recognises that it is one of the country’s most successful commercial radio stations; notes the important service that Radio Borders has provided over the last 18 years for communities across the borders, and wishes the presenters, production team and all involved with Radio Borders’ operation the best of luck for the future.

S3M-1209 Jeremy Purvis: Happy Birthday Radio Borders—That the Parliament congratulates Radio Borders on reaching maturity with the celebrations this week of its 18th birthday; recognises that it is one of the country’s most successful commercial radio stations; notes the important service that Radio Borders has provided over the last 18 years for communities across the borders, and wishes the presenters, production team and all involved with Radio Borders’ operation the best of luck for the future.
S3M-1209 Happy Birthday Radio Borders (lodged on 23 January 2008) Christine Grahame*
S3M-1209 Happy Birthday Radio Borders (lodged on 23 January 2008) John Lamont*
